import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, Col, Container, Row, Table } from "reactstrap"; const ViewUserProfile= ({user})=> { return (

User Information

USER NAME {user.name}
USER EMAIL {user.email}
ABOUT {user.about}
ROLE {user.roles.map((role)=>{ return(
{role.name}
) })}
) } export default ViewUserProfile
